name: Real Tree Strategy
description:
After a few crazy years, let's sit back and focus on growth, in real time. Collect resources to nourish your Heart Tree, expand your roots, and build your forest to expand and maintain your growth. Don't let anything (or anyone) get in your way-- it's your time to flourish!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse Wheel - Zoom 

Click - Take Action (eg grow roots)

Select actions from the actions bar.
